subject: Volleyball
lead_paragraph: Kerri Walsh and Misty May-Treanor rallied from a one-set deficit in the semifinals and final to win the Manhattan Beach Open for a record-tying fourth time. The event is considered the most prestigious in pro beach volleyball. In the final, they beat Elaine Youngs and Nicole Branagh, 15-21, 14-7 (forfeit), 15-12.
